Name: Love Delivery
About the game: This games is about starting a relationship while working delivery job! On a rainy day, you meet three women in an accident you accidentally suffered. But you can't fall in love with them right away. Because you're so trash right now. Don't be disappointed. If you get better, you'll fall in love with them someday. Game features: 1) Appearance, body shape, conversation, style... You have to improve your ability. 2) Many of the episodes that the developers actually experienced are included. 3) Including the full voice of a professional voice actor.
